text: Nice Dreams is a 1981 American adventure comedy movie directed by Tommy Chong. It is the third movie out of Cheech & Chong's movie series and stars Tommy Chong, Cheech Marin, Stacey Keach, Paul Reubens, Evelyn Guerrero, Peter Jason. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1981 adventure movies Category:1981 comedy movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Nice Dreams
